```{R}
library(shiny)
```

```{R}
options(repos = c(CRAN = "https://cloud.r-project.org"))


# Create an example dataframe with row names
df <- data.frame(
  Age = c(25, 30, 35, 40),
  Gender = c("Female", "Male", "Male", "Male")
)

# Assign row names to the dataframe
rownames(df) <- c("Alice", "Bob", "Charlie", "David")

# Print the dataframe
print(df)


# Define UI
ui <- fluidPage(
  titlePanel("Select People"),
  fluidRow(
    column(6, checkboxGroupInput("checkGroup", "Name", choices = rownames(df)))
  ),
  fluidRow(
    column(12, tableOutput("checkedTable"))
  )
)

# Define server logic
server <- function(input, output) {
  # Display table with checked rows
  output$checkedTable <- renderTable({
    req(input$checkGroup)
    checked_rows <- input$checkGroup
    df[checked_rows, , drop = FALSE]
  }, rownames = TRUE)
}

# Run the application
shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
```
